data.title: I FEEL GOOD - The James Brown Story
data.meta_description: I FEEL GOOD , The James Brown Story VOL I RESCHEDULED FOR THE FALL OF 2015 Johnny Gill Breaches Contract- Walks Out On Music Hall's James Brown Musical For a Higher Paying Gig. Producers Seeking Replacement/ I Feel Good To Be rescheduled TBA In Fall 2015 (Detroit, MI) After signing the contract, and receiving a significant deposit, R & B singer, Johnny Gill abruptly cancelled his contract  and walked away from the lead role in  "I Feel Good Vol. 1,  the Music Hall's premiere theatrical presentation of the life of legendary Soul Icon, James Brown  for a a higher paying concert in Chicago. The musical tribute was set to open on time, May 7th, 2015, until Mr. Gill found a more lucrative appearance. "He simply walked out on his executed contract. He even received our deposit and still decided he can just walk away.  It was bad business and the people should know that he really left Music Hall and it's producers and cast, in a lurch." says Music Hall President and Artistic Director, Vince Paul. Music Hall has teamed with "Feelin' Good Productions" and "Drumline" screenwriter Donald Roberts to bring the The Godfather of Soul's life to the stage with a world premiere which was scheduled for May 7-10 2015. Refunds available at point of purchase.
data.text:
I FEEL GOOD , The James Brown Story VOL I

RESCHEDULED FOR THE FALL OF 2015

Johnny Gill Breaches Contract- Walks Out On Music Hall's James Brown Musical For a Higher Paying Gig. Producers Seeking Replacement/ I Feel Good To Be rescheduled TBA In Fall 2015

(Detroit, MI) After signing the contract, and receiving a significant deposit, R & B singer, Johnny Gill abruptly cancelled his contract and walked away from the lead role in "I Feel Good Vol. 1, the Music Hall's premiere theatrical presentation of the life of legendary Soul Icon, James Brown for a a higher paying concert in Chicago.

The musical tribute was set to open on time, May 7th, 2015, until Mr. Gill found a more lucrative appearance.

"He simply walked out on his executed contract. He even received our deposit and still decided he can just walk away. It was bad business and the people should know that he really left Music Hall and it's producers and cast, in a lurch." says Music Hall President and Artistic Director, Vince Paul.

Music Hall has teamed with "Feelin' Good Productions" and "Drumline" screenwriter Donald Roberts to bring the The Godfather of Soul's life to the stage with a world premiere which was scheduled for May 7-10 2015.

Refunds available at point of purchase.

Music Hall has teamed with "Feelin' Good Productions" and "Drumline" screenwriter Donald Roberts to bring the The Godfather of Soul's life to the stage with a world premiere which was scheduled for May 7-10 2015.
